entry.title: Daminette in the wasteland
entry.summary:
Author: Ladybugrules

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,660Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: October 27th, 2077, was the day the world ended when nuclear bombs dropped, turning through the world into a wasteland, but for Marinette and Damian, their world changed when they entered Vault 111 after they saw a Nuclear cloud in the distance. So, after 200 years, they emerged from the vault where they rebuilt or tried to rebuild civilization, but with factions fighting with each other. Marinette and Damian have a hard time on their hands, but at least they have each other with them.It will contain Daminette smut in every chapter

entry.title: Made For Each Other
entry.summary:
Author: generationriot

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,195Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 201

Summary: Dick wasn't totally sure what to expect when Damian told him that he was having his girlfriend over for dinner. After all, there were days where the youngest Wayne didn't talk to anyone at all, even his family. A girlfriend? Well, that seemed completely out of character. Especially since the girlfriend in question turned out to be a sweetheart and, on top of that, an extrovert.~*~A little one-shot about Marinette meeting Damian's family and confusing the shit out of them.

entry.title: letters to lovers (and the aftermath of cherry wine)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 152,493Chapters: 39/?Kudos: 3,190

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng and Damian Wayne-Al Ghul are pen-pals for three years, during that time, Marinette slowly but surely falls in love (and Damian falls with her). Damian has to heal from his childhood and Marinette is still changing from growing pains; they are leaving partners and friends and toxicity and gods behind them.**Warning: reading this may cause whiplash-inducing criterion shift.You will no longer view anger as mad or friends the same way. Your concepts of "childhood" and "the right thing" will forever be changed. You will not be able to change it back.The average species lasts four million years on earth. We've been around for 300,000 of those years, but our ancestors were born six million years ago. To live you must adapt; change. Are you changing? What does that say about you?Reading this may cause delusions. You might start seeing ghosts. Or get a therapist.

entry.title: Sketches & Sabres: The Art of Unexpected Rivalry
entry.summary:
Author: Jasmineose

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,775Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 92

Summary: "You sketched me mid-duel. That’s psychological warfare.”— Damian Wayne, 13, after losing a fencing match by one distracted heartbeat."It’s not my fault your face has dramatic lighting built in.”— Marinette Dupain-Cheng, artist, trouble magnet, professional eyebrow appreciator.“You made me look… like I was thinking. I don’t do that. I act.”— Damian, deeply offended by looking introspective.“To her, everyone has a good side—even the kid raised by assassins with a superiority complex.”— Kagami, dryly, while watching Twitter explode."She hesitated before waving. He hesitated before falling apart.”— Alya’s live-blog, sketchgate_thread_omg_FINALLY2.txt"I didn’t know declaring someone your artistic nemesis was a thing, but I support it.”— Jon Kent, peacemaker, fan of cookies and chaos.“This is the Olympics, not an anime rivalry arc!”— Marinette, yelling into the press chaos as Damian disappears into a dramatic exit.

entry.title: We Should have Stayed in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: skhwriter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 112,966Chapters: 35/35Kudos: 8,986

Summary: The students of Gotham Academy were confused. It was International Friendship Week, and it was Gotham’s turn to host. Except no one wanted Gotham to host, not even Gotham! So the Directors of the Friendship Conference decided that it was in everybody’s best interest to skip the City of Crime and go straight to the City of Lights. Everyone thought that it was the perfect idea! Except for Paris. The Gothamites couldn’t help but laugh and scoff at the Parisians insistence that Gotham would be a much safer place than Paris, and nothing should change. And everyone, even one Damian Wayne, was thrilled when the petition went through, and they boarded the plane for Paris.And then…a giant baby…tried to eat the Eiffel Tower…they should have stayed in Gotham.

entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,466Chapters: 37/?Kudos: 442

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

entry.title: The Right Wrong Place In The Right Wrong Time
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,278Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 537

Summary: Soulmates are rare. Everyone has one, but *meeting* your soulmate is rare. In order to meet your soulmate, you need to shift. In order to shift, you need to be perfectly in sync with your soulmate. Your hearts need to beat in sync, your movements need to be in sync, perfectly mirroring one another. A blink, a *twitch* could be the difference between meeting your soulmate and not.Damian's soulmate shifts to him at the most awkward time possible.
